Package report

Class Report

java.lang.Object
report.Report
public class Report extends Object
Generates report content for different report types, Only has static methods
Since:
2023-11-03

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      public static String generateReport(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportType reportType, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)
      Generate and write reports for a list of camps, a specific report type and output
      Parameters:
      camps - The list of camps for which to generate and write reports.
      filterObj - The filter options for the report.
      reportType - The specific report type to generate.
      reportOutputType - The type of report to generate (TXT or CSV).

    • generateCampDetailsReport

      public static String generateCampDetailsReport(List<Camp> camps, FilterObj filterObj, ReportOutputType reportOutputType)
      Generate a camp details report based on the specified report output type.
      Parameters:
      camps - The list of camps to include in the report.
      filterObj - The filter options for the report.
      reportOutputType - The type of report to generate (TXT or CSV).
      Returns:
      The generated camp details report.

    • matchNames

      private static void matchNames(List<Student> studentList, List<String> filterList)
      Helper function for generateCampDetailsReport Filters by matching a list of substrings to student ID. Changes the passed studentList directly.
      Parameters:
      studentList - The List of Students to filter
      filterList - The list of strings to use for matching

    • csvStudentFormatter

      private static void csvStudentFormatter(StringBuilder reportContent, String campStr, List<Student> stds)
      Helper function for generateCampListReport csv part. Formats student details and appends them to the report content.
      Parameters:
      reportContent - The StringBuilder to append the formatted details.
      campStr - The formatted camp details.
      students - The list of students to include in the report.

    • generateCampCommitteePerformanceReport

      Parameters:

      reportOutputType - The type of report to generate (TXT or CSV).
